header.title: C++ classes generated from user-derived schema types
header.meta: xmlbeans,xmlbeans port to C++, XML, XML Schema, code generator, XML Manipulation, xmlbeansc, xmlbeans++ xmlbeansc++, xmlbeansxx, xmlbeanscxx

body.note: xmlbeansxx was inspired by Apache XMLBeans (developed by The Apache XML Project). Schema Type System is strongly based on XMLBeans Schema Type System.
